title: Biomimetic electrospun PVDF/self-assembling peptide piezoelectric scaffolds for neural stem cell transplantation in neural tissue engineering
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21277-21291

Mahdi Forouharshad, Andrea Raspa, Giuseppe Fortino, Maria Gessica Ciulla, Arman Farazdaghi, Vlad Stolojan, Luca Stendardo, Silvia Bracco, Fabrizio Gelain
Piezoelectric materials can provide in situ electrical stimulation without external chemical or physical support, opening new frontiers for future bioelectric therapies.
